knimeNode.name: Stanford Lemmatizer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Returns the lemma of document terms using the Stanford Core NLP library.

fullDescription.intro:
Lemmatizes terms contained in the input documents with the Stanford Core NLP library. For details about the Stanford Core NLP library, please check here .
This node returns the lemma of a term by removing inflections, e.g in case of plurals, pronoun case, and verb endings. The lemma is based heavily on the Part-Of-Speech (POS) tag of a term, so either the Stanford Node or the POS Node has to be applied before using the Lemmatizer. This node will fail by default when at least one term with no POS tag is found.
Currently only the english language is supported by this node.

tab.name: Lemmatizer options

option.name: Skip terms with no POS tag

tab.option: If checked, all terms that have no POS tag will simply be skipped. Otherwise, the node will fail when at least one term has no POS tag.

tab.name: Preprocessing options
tab.option: The column containing the documents to preprocess.
If checked, the documents will be replaced by the new preprocessed documents. Otherwise the preprocessed documents will be appended as new column.
The name of the new appended column, containing the preprocessed documents.
If checked, unmodifiable terms will be preprocessed too.

ports.inPort: The input table which contains the documents to preprocess.
ports.outPort: The output table which contains the preprocessed documents.
